thread.title: Best speaker deals - hi-fi, Bluetooth, wireless
thread.title_full: Best speaker deals - hi-fi, Bluetooth, wireless

author: Max Langridge
title: Best speaker deals - hi-fi, Bluetooth, wireless
text:
Best speaker deals - hi-fi, Bluetooth, wireless 14th February 2017 Looking for a new pair of speakers to boost your system? Or a portable, multi-room or wireless speaker? We've managed to track down some great offers on products from KEF, Sonos, Bose and more... 
Speakers are the all-important link in the music chain, and finding the perfect pair for your system can be tricky. To help narrow down your options , we've rounded-up the best deals around on some of our favourites. 
Click the links to read the full reviews, compare prices or just head straight to the best price.
